sentences.en: Computers have done away with a lot of the repetitive work.
sentences.cn: 有了计算机就不必再做很多重复性的劳动.

sentences.en: Defence objects to introduction of these repetitive documents.
sentences.cn: 被告对这些反复性的证据材料表示反对.

sentences.en: He, too, was tipsy and his explanations were repetitive.
sentences.cn: 他自己也喝醉了,他反复地解释.

sentences.en: His job consists of dull , repetitive work.
sentences.cn: 他干的是些单调重复的工作.

sentences.en: Just a generation ago, women were largely confined to repetitive, menial jobs.
sentences.cn: 就在上一代人, 女性被限制于主要从事重复生产 、 仆人工作.

sentences.en: My job is so repetitive, it does not require much conscious thought.
sentences.cn: 我的工作重复性很强, 不需要很多有意识的思考.

sentences.en: Rave music is defined as anything with a repetitive beat.
sentences.cn: 锐舞音乐的定义是一种重复节拍.

sentences.en: Robots can relieve people of dull and repetitive work.
sentences.cn: 单调重复的工作,机器人可以代劳.

sentences.en: Suddenly music that seemed dull and repetitive comes alive.
sentences.cn: 突然间，似乎索然无味且反反复复的音乐生动了起来。

sentences.en: The clinical history revealed repetitive pressure on her thighs during the work.
sentences.cn: 临床病史显示病人因工作时紧靠机器而造成重覆施压于大腿.

sentences.en: The song was dreary and repetitive.
These may result in wrong pricing , creation of distorted patterns of demand by repetitive advertising.
sentences.cn: 这些可引起标价错误, 造成重复广告宣传所引起的畸形的需求.

sentences.en: This would help prevent the responses from becoming repetitive and predictable.
sentences.cn: 这将有助于预防回应的重复性和可预知性.

words.tran_cn: [通信] 中继器；[通信] 转发器；重复者

trans.tran_en: done many times in the same way, and boring
